summary: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.
cast: Jeff Bridges|Mackenzie Foy|Rachel McAdams|Marion Cotillard|Riley Osborne|James Franco|Bud Cort|Benicio Del Toro|Ricky Gervais|Albert Brooks|Paul Rudd|Paul Giamatti|Jeffy Branion|Jacquie Barnbrook|Marcel Bridges|André Dussollier|Florence Foresti|Vincent Cassel|Guillaume Gallienne|Laurent Lafitte|Vincent Lindon|Guillaume Canet|Pascal Légitimus|Achille Orsoni|Clara Poincaré|Andrea Santamaría|Bernard Tiphaine
keywords: based on book|cgi animation|stop motion animation|desert|rose
title: El principito
